title: Sudney
author: Sudney
content: Why Does This Matter? Why Should I Care?Michael Kruger provided key statements and evidence in this case, and was subject to extensive intimidation and suppression, led by FBI Special Agent David Cirilli.His family and his business were threatened. In particular, his ownership of a building that the postal service leases was put in the crosshairs during conversations, as he was told “it would be too bad if that (lease) disappeared.”Kruger connects the dots with the players in our infographic.Kruger also fears for his life for telling the truth.What Should I Do Next?Read this expose, and review the documents linked to in it.SHARE IT WITH AS MANY PEOPLE AS POSSIBLE, SHARE IT ON SOCIAL MEDIA, SHARE IT WITH NEWS OUTLETS.Click here to read more:  https://sherloc.substack.com/p/us-government-exposed-us-vs-crater-9bfClick here For a podcast: https://www.podbean.com/ew/pb-86d8g-12a5559#CRYPTO #DOJ #CORRUPTION #BTC #ETH #XRP #Overreach #GoverementOverreach #winatallcost #LicensetoLie
